actions.name: Lance
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit (with disadvantage against a target within 5 ft.), reach 10 ft., one target. 8 (1d12 + 2 damage) piercing damage, or 11 (1d12 + 5 damage) piercing damage while mounted.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Feather Fall
entries: The rider wears a magic ring with which it can cast the {@spell feather fall} spell on itself once as a reaction to falling. After the spell is cast, the ring becomes nonmagical.
